about_the_game:
Your very first step out of the family house! Discover a mysterious outer world inhabited by zany creatures called Risimon. In this epic quest you follow Celestine, a 25-year-old kidult whose actions have crossed the line. Make a clean break from the past and set out on a grand journey across Issou! Discover a land shrouded in mystery and plots, but full of lovable Risimons!

Once out of the family nest, it is up to you how to lead your adventure:

  • Play Celestine, a constantly belittled kidult with no charisma or wisdom, unwillingly embarked on crazy events…

  • Experience a searing satire through a comical story. A perfect blend inspired by the current way of the world and the Internet culture.

  • Discover the 10 main zones of Issou, from Forumborough to Wokehaven. Every zone embodies a specific theme, with its own design and characteristic inhabitants.

  • Explore numerous secondary zones, complete unique quests and side storylines, unveil long-forgotten secrets…

  • Meet hundreds of hilarious characters and ludicrous creatures, all of them having a specifically-written development and specifically-designed appearance.

  • Follow the story of Chad, Emily, Selenite and that of many other memorable characters you will encounter on your adventure!

Risimons can be caught to form a team ready for action! Defeat any of the opponents you encounter on your journey!

  • Find and catch those untamed creatures, embodiments of crazy, ludicrous or cynical themes.

  • Form a team worthy of the name, overcome trials and champions in their Gyms all over the region.

  • Train your team, rise to the trickiest challenges the game offers.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Some Nudity or Sexual Content, Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

short_description: Risimon is an adventure & monster-taming game combining an off-the-wall tone with a retro, yet restyled, aesthetic. Experience a hilarious journey across the Issou region. Catch Risimon, train them and fight to prove to yourself that you are NOT a loser!
